title: For God so loved the world

versions.KJV: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
versions.NIV: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

versions.KJV: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
versions.NIV: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
